body:
I get the following error when I build xsdk.

```
==> Installing netlib-scalapack
==> Searching for binary cache of netlib-scalapack
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for netlib-scalapack found: installing from source
==> Error: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/-'

```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ git checkout balay/test
$ spack install xsdk
```

### Information on your system

This error occurred on multiple machines [ubuntu-18.04, Mac OSX, other linuxes]

Sometimes the error goes away when I redo the build.

Note: This is with latest develop + xsdk changes. Previously I was on develop snapshot from a few weeks back - and did not have this problem.

Note:  `spack install netlib-scalapack` does not produce this error.
title: error installing scalapack
